Premise: You are stranded on an island with no memory of how you got there. You need to overcome a series of obstacles in order to be able to to board a pirate ship and sail it to civilization.
IntroText: You have just awakened on a strange island with a terrible headache. You can't remember anything about yourself or where you are.
IslandText: The island is forested with banana trees. But one tree to your west might have ripe bananas. There are ominous drums in the background. There is a ship to your south with a gangplank to the shore.
SailText: The ship is really big and it will take at least another extra pair of hands to successfully sail it towards civilization
SailTextAlt: You successfully sailed the ship towards civilization

Objectives.knife: You obtained a knife from the captain's quarters
Objectives.gorilla: You gave the grumpy gorilla a banana. The gorilla was satisfied and has given you access to the ship's wheel.
Objectives.cell_key: Pierre the parrot has told you that there is a hidden compartment in the captain's quarters that contains the key to the prisoner's cell.
Objectives.prisoner: You successfully freed One Eyed Popeye from his cell. He is willing to help you sail the ship towards civilization.
Objectives.chest_key: You obtained what it seems to be a key to a chest.
Objectives.treasure: You found a treasure in the Cargo Hold.
Objectives.natives: You gave the native chief a very shiny treasure. Now, the island natives treats you as their dear friend.

Top_Deck_Ladder.description_short: Your in the top deck of the ship
Top_Deck_Ladder.description_long: The top deck has a wheel at the north end of the ship, and the south end of the ship has a ladder down to the lower deck. There is a large gorilla by the ship's wheel.

Ship_Wheel.description_long: You are at the wheel. There is a hostile gorilla preventing you from approaching the wheel.

Bottom_Deck_Ladder.description_short: Your in the bottom deck of the ship
Bottom_Deck_Ladder.description_long: The deck below is dimly lit, and smells musty. You can make out three doors. One is to the east, one is to the west, and one is a trapdoor below you.

Galley.description_long: This is the galley. It is mostly empty, but in a shadowy corner you see a parrot sitting on a perch.

Brig.description_long: This is the brig. In this room there is a prisoner in a locked cell.

Captain_Quarters.description_long: This is the captain's quarters. In this room there is a bed and a table(There is a knife in the table)

Cargo_Hold.description_long: You've entered the cargo hold. There are barrels, a pile of tools, and a trunk.

Plank.description_short: You can use this plank to go to the island or board the ship.
Plank.description_long: You can use this plank to go to the island or board the ship. Beware of strange things in the island.

Banana_Tree.description_short: There is a large banana tree.
Banana_Tree.description_long: There is a large banana tree here. (There is one bunch of ripe bananas on the tree within reach.)

Character.description: A person who one day woke up on an unknown island. Having no recollection of what happened decided to sail the pirate ship towards civilization.

Native_Chief.description: The chief of a native tribe in an unknown island. He really fancies shiny stuff.
Native_Chief.name: Shiny Rare Chieftain

Native.description: A member of the native tribe in an unknown island. This guy follows the chief wherever he goes.
Native.name: Native Grunt

Parrot.description: The pirate captain's most trusted crew member. He will never say anything other than lorem ipsum...
Parrot.name: Pierrot
Parrot.alt_dialog: Lorem! There is a secret compartment in the captain's quarters. Lorem!!!

Prisoner.description: A crew of the stranded pirate ship. He seems to know you.
Prisoner.name: One eyed Popeye
Prisoner.dialog: I'm so glad you're alive. The captain locked me up for cheating at cards, which is the only reason the islanders didn't capture me. They killed everyone else. Now I guess we're the only two left, which makes you captain since you were first mate. Go find the keys to unlock this door, and we can sail out of here.
Prisoner.alt_dialog: Let's leave this scary island and sail towards civilization!!!

Knife.description: An item that could be use to cut things
Knife.name: Knife

BrigKey.description: A key that could open the Brig
BrigKey.name: Brig key

Key.description: A key that could open locked things
Key.name: Chest key

Banana.description: Tasty ripe banana if given to somebody will surely make their day
Banana.name: Banana

Treasure.description: Shiny shimmering thing that will surely make someone your friend
Treasure.name: Gold bar
